Test case Name: Add a growing table row under Water Damage - Positive
Description: Verify user can add description and amount/percentage in Additional Deductible growing table and that values print in English and French
Actions:
1. Login to EZDocs application and take a PBR submission
2. Select the product "Project Builders Risk" from product dropdown
3. Upload the ratar file
4. Navigate to Coverage -> Extensions Coverages section
5. Under Water Damage coverage, open the Additional Deductible growing table
6. Click 'Add Row'
7. Enter Description: "Water pipe burst - basement"
8. Enter Amount: 125.75
9. Leave Percentage blank (or enter as applicable)
10. Save the submission
11. Generate English and French documents
Expected Results: When a row with Description and Amount is added the row is saved successfully. Amount values are rounded to the nearest integer where applicable. The entered Description and rounded Amount appear correctly in both the English and French generated documents.

Test case Name: Growing table boundary - Multiple rows and rounding
Description: Verify the growing table supports multiple rows, long descriptions, and rounding of Amount values
Actions:
1. Login to EZDocs application and take a PBR submission
2. Select the product "Project Builders Risk" from product dropdown
3. Upload the ratar file
4. Navigate to Coverage -> Extensions Coverages section
5. Under Water Damage coverage, open the Additional Deductible growing table
6. Click 'Add Row' and repeat to add 10 rows
7. For each row enter a long Description (e.g., 250+ characters) and Amounts with many decimals (e.g., 12.7890, 99.4999)
8. Save the submission
9. Generate English and French documents
Expected Results: All added rows are saved and displayed in the growing table. Amount values are rounded to the nearest integer in the UI and in the printed documents. All descriptions and rows appear in both English and French documents; long descriptions are handled per UI rules (displayed or truncated consistently).
